title: EkAmranAthEshvarENa
sahitya:
EkAmranAthEshvarENa samrakSitOham shrI


anupallavi

 mUka mukhya vAkprada nipuNEna munigaNAdi guruguha 
sannutEna pAkashAsanAdi pUjita vara pancAkSara svarUpENa


caraNam   kAncIpura vilasita prabhAvEna panca bhUtAtmakEna shivEna 
vAnchitArttha pradEna caturanga balEshvarI mOhitAkArENa
